content:
Awastara
Awastara is a city populated by the Miskito people located in the department of North Caribbean Coast Autonomous Region in Nicaragua.[1]
The King Pulanka, the traditional feast of the Miskito, originated in Awastara.[2]

Further reading
Philip A Dennis, The Miskito People of Awastara, 2004. ISBN 978-0-292-70281-3.
Coordinates: 14°18′N 83°13′W﻿ / ﻿14.300°N 83.217°W﻿ / 14.300; -83.217
